org.sql: SELECT accounts.id FROM accounts INNER JOIN follows ON accounts.id = follows.account_id LEFT OUTER JOIN account_stats ON account_stats.account_id = accounts.id WHERE follows.target_account_id = "$1" ORDER BY follows.id DESC LIMIT "$2" OFFSET "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT accounts.id FROM accounts INNER JOIN follows ON accounts.id = follows.account_id LEFT OUTER JOIN account_stats ON account_stats.account_id = accounts.id WHERE follows.target_account_id = "$1" ORDER BY follows.id DESC LIMIT "$2" OFFSET "$3"
